Uses of Interface
org.gridgain.grid.GridProjection

Packages that use GridProjection
org.gridgain.grid  Start Here  Contains main Compute Grid APIs. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache  Start Here  Contains main Data Grid APIs. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.query Contains query related public classes and interfaces. 
org.gridgain.grid.lang Contains general language constructs and functional APIs.

Subinterfaces of GridProjection in org.gridgain.grid
 interface Grid
          Start Here  Main Compute Grid APIs.
 interface GridRichNode
          Defines a "rich" node as a single node-based grid projection.

          Grid Spring bean allows to bypass GridFactory methods.
